fullgame.name: Angry Video Game Nerd II: ASSimilation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 256MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
